Drugs and Drug Classes

Source: vignettes/drugs_and_classes.Rmd
drugs_and_classes.Rmd

Introduction 

library(PDSdatabase)
library(rlang)
library(dplyr)
## 
## Attaching package: 'dplyr'
## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
## 
##     filter, lag
## The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

##     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)

theme_set(
    ggthemes::theme_tufte() + theme(text = element_text(size=16,face="bold"))
)

This vignette showcases the reported drugs and drug classes in the PDSdatabase:

  • How many drug compounds are listed in reports

  • How many classes of drugs are listed in reports

  • How many drugs and classes of drugs are listed in reports

  • What are the most frequent drugs and classes of drugs listed in reports across child development stages

download_sqlite_db() #downloads to cache, if not already there

Connect to the database: 

con <- connect_sqlite_db()

How many drug compounds are listed in reports?

The field atc_concept_id is the concept adentifier for each drugâ€™s ingredient encoded in the ATC vocabulary. Below is the number of distinct drug ingredients or compounds:

tbl(con,"ade_raw") %>% 
    distinct(atc_concept_id) %>% 
    count()
## # Source:   SQL [1 x 1]
## # Database: sqlite 3.39.4 [/home/runner/.cache/R/PDSdatabase/effect_peds_19q2_v0.3_20211119.sqlite]
##       n
##   <int>
## 1  1088

The number of drug compounds across reports:

tbl(con,"ade_raw") %>% 
    distinct(safetyreportid,atc_concept_id) %>% 
    group_by(safetyreportid) %>% 
    count(name = "Ndrugs") %>% 
    group_by(Ndrugs) %>% 
    count(name="Nreports") %>% 
    collect() %>% 
    ggplot(aes(Ndrugs,Nreports)) +
    geom_bar(stat="identity",color="black",fill="gray") +
    labs(x="Number of drugs listed in reports",
         y="Number of reports") +
    scale_y_continuous(trans="log10",labels=scales::comma)

How many classes of drugs are listed in reports? 

tbl(con,"ade_raw") %>% 
    distinct(safetyreportid,
           atc_concept_id) %>% 
    collect() %>% 
    inner_join(
        tbl(con,"drug") %>% 
            distinct(atc_concept_id,atc1_concept_name) %>% 
            collect(),
        by="atc_concept_id"
    ) %>% 
    group_by(atc1_concept_name) %>% 
    summarise(
        N = n_distinct(safetyreportid)
    ) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(N,atc1_concept_name)) +
    geom_bar(stat="identity",color="black",fill="gray") +
    labs(x="Number of reports",y="")

What are the most frequent drugs and classes of drugs listed in reports across child development stages? 

scale_y_reordered <- function(..., sep = "___") {
  reg <- paste0(sep, ".+$")
  ggplot2::scale_y_discrete(labels = function(x) gsub(reg, "", x), ...)
}

reorder_within <- function(x, by, within, fun = mean, sep = "___", ...) {
  new <- paste(x, within, sep = sep)
  stats::reorder(new, by, FUN = fun)
}

drug_tbl <- 
    tbl(con,"drug") %>% 
    distinct(atc_concept_id,atc_concept_name,
             !!!rlang::syms(paste0("atc",1:4,"_concept_name"))
             ) %>% 
    collect() %>% 
    rename(atc5_concept_name = atc_concept_name) %>% 
    pivot_longer(
        cols=paste0("atc",1:5,"_concept_name"),
        names_to = "atc_class",
        values_to = "value"
    ) 

drug_tbl
## # A tibble: 5,440 Ã— 3

##  3        1588648 atc3_concept_name ANGIOTENSIN II RECEPTOR BLOCKERS (ARBs), COâ€¦
##  4        1588648 atc4_concept_name Angiotensin II receptor blockers (ARBs), otâ€¦
##  5        1588648 atc5_concept_name valsartan and sacubitril

## 10        1588697 atc5_concept_name ivacaftor and lumacaftor                    
## # â€¦ with 5,430 more rows

In all childhood 

tmp <- tbl(con,"ade_raw") %>% 
    distinct(safetyreportid,
           atc_concept_id) %>% 
    collect() %>% 
    inner_join(
        drug_tbl,
        by="atc_concept_id"
    ) %>% 
    group_by(value) %>% 
    summarise(
        Nreports = n_distinct(safetyreportid)
        ) %>% 
    inner_join(
        drug_tbl %>% 
            distinct(atc_class,value),
        by="value"
    ) %>% 
    arrange(desc(Nreports)) %>% 
    group_by(atc_class) %>% 
    slice_head(n=10)

tmp %>% 
    ggplot(aes(Nreports,reorder_within(value,Nreports,atc_class))) +
    geom_bar(stat="identity") +
    scale_y_reordered() +
    facet_wrap(~atc_class,ncol=1,scales="free_y") +
    xlab("Number of safety reports from birth through 21 years old") +
    ylab("")

Birth through 1 month olds - Term Neonates 

stage="term_neonatal"

tmp <- 
    tbl(con,"ade_raw") %>% 
    filter(nichd==!!stage) %>% 
    distinct(safetyreportid,
           atc_concept_id) %>% 
    collect() %>% 
    inner_join(
        drug_tbl,
        by="atc_concept_id"
    ) %>% 
    group_by(value) %>% 
    summarise(
        Nreports = n_distinct(safetyreportid)
        ) %>% 
    inner_join(
        drug_tbl %>% 
            distinct(atc_class,value),
        by="value"
    ) %>% 
    arrange(desc(Nreports)) %>% 
    group_by(atc_class) %>% 
    slice_head(n=10)

tmp %>% 
    ggplot(aes(Nreports,reorder_within(value,Nreports,atc_class))) +
    geom_bar(stat="identity") +
    scale_y_reordered() +
    facet_wrap(~atc_class,ncol=1,scales="free_y") +
    xlab("Number of safety reports in term neonates") +
    ylab("")

Disconnect database: 

disconnect_sqlite_db(con)
